overview: The film is starred by the famous actress Yu Shinoda, who plays a married young woman who lives with her husband and father-in-law. The husband is tired of making a living every day, regardless of sex, even though the wife’s dress is very revealing and attractive. The husband was also left unmoved. While the wife sighed, the father-in-law had long coveted the body of the wife. He could only rely on voyeurism every day to comfort him, and the father-in-law was also very distressed. Finally, one day, the father-in-law was hungry. The thirsty young woman stretched out her claws...
title: Instead of Husband
